title: 32 - Chad Daniels
itunes:title: 32 - Chad Daniels
description: Dad Chaniels! That’s the name of Chad Daniels’ most recent comedy special and just a fun spoonerism. You may know Chad from this special, Conan, Comedy Central, his many popular comedy albums, and his own podcast Middle Of Somewhere. But we got a chance to chat with him in green room at ACME while passing through Minneapolis, and it was a real treat. We’re talking everything from being out in the boonies to Mitch Hedberg to our relationships with our grandmothers. Here are five words to describe this episode: stay away from the comb.

itunes:author: All Things Comedy
